column2: Job Title: Forex Specialist Location:  Ghansoli, Navi Mumbai Experience:  1+ years in Foreign Exchange, with banking experience Salary:  3L to 6L (depending on last drawn) Key Requirements: - Strong knowledge of Forex - Excellent communication skills - Immediate joiners only Job Summary: - Ensure all cross-border payments comply with South African Reserve Bank (SARB) requirements before release. - Consult with internal and external stakeholders to meet all requirements for payment submission. Responsibilities: - Accurately capture Balance of Payment (BOP) data and apply correct SARB rulings. - Release payments within the agreed service level agreement (SLA). - Stay updated on statutory and legislative requirements related to SARB rulings. - Provide efficient administration services and update relevant systems. - Develop and manage key stakeholder relationships. - Ensure high-quality work adhering to compliance and governance standards. - Continuously assess and improve performance, seeking feedback and training as needed. Skills: - Understanding of Reserve Bank exchange control rules. - Experience with cross-border payments.
